name: Guns of Icarus Online
blurb: Captain a steampunk airship and fly with your friends in this thrilling MMO air combat game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
ksr_blurb: <p>The creators of <i><a href="http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/musegames/creavures" target="_blank">Creavures</a></i> are back, this time with a team-based, first-person multiplayer airship combat game set in a post-apocalyptic, steampunk world. In <i>Guns of Icarus Online</i>\u00a0you'll be right in the middle of all the action as you fly around and battle other airships.</p>

rewards.reward: OUR THANKS \u2013 We'll send you an e-card designed by us thanking you for your generous support!
TAKE TO THE SKIES \u2013 A digital copy of the game for PC or Mac when it comes out and access to the closed beta version of the game!

MUSIC TO YOUR EARS \u2013 A digital copy of the game for PC or Mac, PLUS the complete digital soundtrack crafted by local indie composer Adam Chimera!  PLUS early access to the closed beta AND one exclusive in-game costume!
FIRST MATE - Two digital copies of the game, one for you and one for a friend! You'll both also get early closed beta access and an exclusive costume!
LOOT DROP \u2013 The game and the soundtrack, the beta access, the exclusive costume, PLUS your choice of a Guns of Icarus Online T-shirt or poster!
CAPTAIN AND CREW - Four digital copies of the game for you and your friends! You'll all get early closed beta access and an exclusive costume, PLUS the digital soundtrack!

CAPTAIN'S LOG \u2013 The game, the soundtrack, beta access and an exclusive costume, PLUS a custom-designed steampunk Captain's Log Notebook, with original artwork by our talented artists AND a supporter credit!
ART COLLECTOR \u2013 The game, the soundtrack, beta access, and an exclusive costume PLUS a numbered limited-edition poster signed by the team AND a supporter credit!

TREASURE TROVE \u2013 Custom-designed Guns of Icarus Online USB stick containing the game, the soundtrack, the digital Guns of Icarus Online Art Book and an Art Documentary with exclusive 3D art tips, tricks, and behind-the-scenes info, PLUS beta access, an exclusive costume, and a supporter credit!
CARGO HAUL \u2013 Custom USB stick (game, soundtrack, digital art book, and documentary), beta access, an exclusive costume, and a supporter credit, PLUS your choice of a T-shirt or poster!

RARE TOME \u2013 Custom USB stick (game, soundtrack, digital art book, and documentary), beta access, an exclusive costume, and a supporter credit, PLUS your choice of the Captain's Log notebook or a printed copy of the Guns of Icarus Online Art Book!

PLUNDER PACK - Custom USB stick (game, soundtrack, digital art book, and documentary), beta access, an exclusive costume, and a supporter credit, PLUS a T-shirt, a poster, a Captain's Log Notebook AND a printed Art Book!
THE CRAFTER - Custom USB stick, beta access, and an exclusive costume, PLUS work with us to design a piece of ship or player equipment in the game and receive a collaborator credit!

KEY PLAYER - Custom USB stick, beta access, and an exclusive costume, PLUS work with us to design a piece of player equipment AND a custom character in the game! Your character's digital portrait will featured in the official game character page and you'll receive a collaborator credit!

OUR HERO - Be a part of our creative process! In addition to receiving the Guns of Icarus Online USB stick with all the digital content, closed beta access, and an exclusive costume, you'll work with us to design a custom piece of equipment, a character, AND an original quest line. You'll receive a collaborator credit, and our sincere thanks!
